short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension, TypeScript, Visual Studio Code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Summarizer is a highly dynamic and helpful Chrome Extension for individuals who constantly read large amounts of text, or need to comprehend key points from complex websites rapidly. With just one click, our tool simplifies your workflow by summarizing text and web content from any URL.

Whether you are a student who needs to extract main points for your study material, a researcher exploring numerous references, or a professional manning a host of diverse subjects, Quick Summarizer can reduce your workload significantly by providing concise summaries of lengthy information instantly.

Features:

Summarize Text: Highlight any portion of text on a webpage and click the Quick Summarizer icon in your extensions toolbar to receive a condensed summary.

Summarize URLs: Paste a web URL into the Quick Summarizer interface, and watch as our tool effortlessly renders a summary of the page's main content.

User Friendly: The tool is designed for simplicity and ease of use. It doesn't matter whether you're tech-savvy or a beginner; Quick Summarizer is just a click away!

Safe & Secure: We understand the value of data privacy, hence, your inputs for summaries are not stored or shared.

Quick Summarizer aims to save your time and increase productivity by digesting large volumes of information into bite-sized, comprehensible summaries. Install now and enhance your browsing experience by gaining key insights faster than ever.

Note: This Chrome Extension works best with English language content. The accuracy of summaries may differ based on the complexity of the text or webpage
